      • getDimensions

        public int[] getDimensions()
        Gets the dimensions of the matrix.
        Returns:
        two integers in the form of an array. The first result is the number of rows, and the second result is the number of columns.

      • matrixMultiply

        public Matrix matrixMultiply(Matrix other)
                      throws DimensionMismatchException
        Return a new matrix, the product of this and other. In other words, (this)(other), which is different from (other)(this).
        Parameters:
        other - another matrix whose height is the same as this matrix's width
        Returns:
        the matrix product, which is a new matrix
        Throws:
        DimensionMismatchException - thrown when the matrices have incompatible dimensions

      • elementwiseSigmoid

        public Matrix elementwiseSigmoid()
        Applies the sigmoid to each individual cell of the old matrix.
        Returns:
        a new matrix, whose cells are the sigmoid of the corresponding cells of the old matrix

      • elementwiseSigmoidDerivative

        public Matrix elementwiseSigmoidDerivative()
        Applies the derivative of the sigmoid to each individual cell of the old matrix.
        Returns:
        a new matrix, whose cells are the derivative of the sigmoid of the corresponding cells of the old matrix

      • elementwiseAdd

        public Matrix elementwiseAdd(Matrix other)
                      throws DimensionMismatchException
        Adds the corresponding elements of two matrices together.
        Parameters:
        other - the other matrix
        Returns:
        a new matrix, whose cells are the sum of the corresponding cells of the old matrices
        Throws:
        DimensionMismatchException - thrown when the two matrices are not the same size

      • elementwiseSubtract

        public Matrix elementwiseSubtract(Matrix other)
                           throws DimensionMismatchException
        Subtracts the corresponding elements of two matrices together.
        Parameters:
        other - the other matrix
        Returns:
        a new matrix, whose cells are the difference of the corresponding cells of the old matrices
        Throws:
        DimensionMismatchException - thrown when the two matrices are not the same size

      • slice

        public Matrix slice(int startRows,
                    int endRows,
                    int startCols,
                    int endCols)
        Returns a new matrix, which is this[startRows:endRows, startCols:endCols]. The rows and columns designated by endRows and endCols are not included in the return value.
        Parameters:
        startRows - the first row
        endRows - the end row, which supports Python-style negatives
        startCols - the first column
        endCols - the last column, which supports Python-style negatives
        Returns:
        the slice

      • slice

        public Matrix slice(int startRows,
                    int startCols)
        Returns a new matrix, which is this[startRows:end, startCols:end]. In other words, it returns the bottom right corner of the matrix.
        Parameters:
        startRows - the first row
        startCols - the first column
        Returns:
